name: Den Tale
description:
This is a retro 2d platformer game.
If you like Wonder Boy,  Shovel Knight or Cave story you will love this game too.

This game is in prototype phase and likely has more than a few bugs.

Many more levels, enemies and bosses will be added depending on support.

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys : Move / shoot direction
↓: Interaction
A/S : Change weapon
Z : Jump / Jetpack
X : Shoot
C : Use missile
